title: Festive Glam Pink
description: Embellished Crop Top: A touch of sparkle that sets the festive tone instantly.
Flared Skirt: Flowy, feminine, and made to twirl. Perfect for every celebration.
Potli Bag: Traditional charm meets modern style. Carry your essentials in style.
Strappy Heels: Sleek and flattering. They add just the right amount of glam.
Statement Jewelry: Let your jewelry do the talking for that radiant festive glow.
Soft Glam Makeup: Dewy skin, glossy lips, and a hint of shimmer to complete the magic.
flatlayAlt: Flat lay of festive glam pink outfit
modelAlt: Model wearing the festive glam pink outfit styled from the flat lay
